input: "Can you provide details on the Post Matric Scholarship for Students with Disabilities?"
expected: "Post Matric Scholarship Students With Disabilities: This scheme aims to provide financial support to students with disabilities for their post-matric education. It outlines scholarship amounts, eligibility criteria, the application process, and the necessary documentation."

input: "What is the National Youth Corps scheme?"
expected: "National Youth Corps: This initiative is designed to engage young people in developmental activities. It provides opportunities for skill development, training programs, and job placements, along with clear eligibility criteria, application procedures, and required documentation."

input: "Tell me about the Pre Matric Scholarship for Scheduled Tribe Students."
expected: "Pre Matric Scholarship For Scheduled Tribe Students: This scheme offers financial assistance to Scheduled Tribe students before matriculation. It details scholarship benefits, eligibility requirements, application procedures, and necessary documentation."

input: "I need information on Top Class Education for Scheduled Caste Students."

input: "What does the Skill Loan Scheme offer?"

input: "Can you give details about the Scheme for Financial Assistance for Veteran Artists?"

input: "What is the Nikshay Poshan Yojana?"
expected: "Nikshay Poshan Yojana (Nutritional Support To TB Patients): This scheme provides nutritional support to tuberculosis patients to aid their recovery. It details eligibility, the application process, benefits, and the required documentation."
